ai-thag16.9:1.1_0: Leaving my mother and father behind,
ai-thag16.9:1.2_0: as well as sisters, kinsmen, and brothers;
ai-thag16.9:1.3_0: having given up the five sensual titillations,
ai-thag16.9:2.3_0: but not by that purity of mindfulness.
ai-thag16.9:3.1_0: But a mindful disciple of the Buddha
ai-thag16.9:3.2_0: I delight in the Buddha’s teaching.
ai-thag16.9:3.3_0: Having crossed over the entire flood,
ai-thag16.9:4.3_0: having crossed over these as well,
ai-thag16.9:5.3_0: seeking rags from the dust heap,
ai-thag16.9:6.2_0: selected rags from the dust heap;
ai-thag16.9:6.3_0: he picked them up, washed, dyed, and wore them;
ai-thag16.9:7.2_0: who has many wishes and is not content,
ai-thag16.9:10.2_0: the supreme Teacher in the world
ai-thag16.9:10.3_0: came to me in a mind-made body,
ai-thag16.9:13.2_0: I have not lain down to sleep.
ai-thag16.9:14.2_0: for such a one of steady heart.
ai-thag16.9:15.1_0: He put up with painful feelings
ai-thag16.9:15.4_0: was like the extinguishing of a lamp.”
ai-thag16.9:16.1_0: “Now these touches and the other four
ai-thag16.9:16.2_0: are the last to be experienced by the sage;
ai-thag16.9:16.3_0: nor will there be other phenomena
ai-thag16.9:16.4_0: since the Buddha became fully extinguished.
ai-thag16.9:17.1_0: Weaver of the web in the company of the gods,
ai-thag16.9:17.2_0: there’ll be no more lives in the hosts of gods.
ai-thag16.9:17.4_0: now there’ll be no more future lives.”
ai-thag16.9:18.3_0: that mendicant, a master of psychic powers,
ai-thag16.9:20.1_0: Then I was reborn in the Sakyan clan,
ai-thag16.9:21.2_0: the Teacher, fearing nothing from any quarter;
ai-thag16.9:21.3_0: filling my mind with confidence in him,
ai-thag16.9:22.4_0: and stayed among the Thirty-Three gods.
ai-thag16.9:23.1_0: Seven times I was a king of men
ai-thag16.9:26.2_0: I know the passing away and rebirth of beings,
ai-thag16.9:26.3_0: They go from this state to another,
ai-thag16.9:26.4_0: their lives in this state and that.
ai-thag16.9:27.4_0: the attachment to rebirth is eradicated.
ai-thag16.9:28.1_0: In the Vajjian village of Veḷuva,
ai-thag16.9:28.2_0: my life will come to an end.
